summary: To secure a responsible position in the company, which offers a positive environment to learn new technologies, where I can contribute my skills for the growth of an organization.

projects.title: Mi Property Portal
projects.description: Its single web portal has all the integrated modules to manage properties of any size. Which includes Tenant Screening, Online Rent Collection, Accounting & Reporting, Lead Management, Automated Forms, Maintenance Tracking, Property Inspection etc.

projects.title: MindStaq
projects.description: MindStaq is the next generation office suite that works the way the 21st century digital mind works. MindStaq leverages the power of web technology to create a dynamic productivity tool geared for today’s mindset and sensibilities– creating, consuming, collaborating, and reviewing content on a screen rather than in print format.

projects.title: Orgill (United States & Canada)
projects.description: Orgill, Inc. distributes hardware and home improvement products to hardware, home improvement, and building material retailers in the United States, Canada and internationally. It offers advertising, marketing, and sales programs; and retail services.

projects.title: Aybiz
projects.description: Aybiz is a business finder with a personality. Easily explore thousands of businesses and products in Kuwait and the Middle East.

projects.title: ClearCaptions
projects.description: ClearCaptions is a free phone captioning service that provides near real-time call captions of phone conversations for anyone hard-of-hearing or with any form of hearing loss.

projects.title: RV Rental
projects.description: RV Rentals brings doers and dreamers together, providing RV owners with the best, most intuitive platform and tools to start making real money from their RV.

projects.title: Auto-DX
projects.description: Auto-Dx app is a ZS SaaS offering to address exploratory data mining needs.
